title: This explains how Leblanc's shacle is BS
body:
https://giphy.com/gifs/FhSRpCm9VqL4I

Sneaky is forced to use his escape yet he's still in range of the tether. Why cant we just revert it to how it was before her rework?

Edit: too late to change the title, my bad.

replies.body:
Why he didn't just E before it hit him?
Why didn't his team prevent the LB from walking forward to keep him in range of the pop?

> [{quoted}](name=Breaku,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EpuBO81Q,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-08T15:26:56.082+0000)
>
> Why he didn't just E before it hit him?
> Why didn't his team prevent the LB from walking forward to keep him in range of the pop?

in the original clip she used her w to gap close giving him a small window to react. Also they were pretty far behind this match, 31/16

You're probably one of the people that doesn't read patch notes, her passive (being the main source of damage in this clip) got good sized nerfs in the early and mid game. Late game it's the same damage, however as you stated to someone else, their team was extremely far behind so it makes sense that a 100% squishy champion would get that chunked vs a LB.

> [{quoted}](name=Shuyin178,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EpuBO81Q,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-02-08T16:16:28.745+0000)
>
> You're probably one of the people that doesn't read patch notes, her passive (being the main source of damage in this clip) got good sized nerfs in the early and mid game. Late game it's the same damage, however as you stated to someone else, their team was extremely far behind so it makes sense that a 100% squishy champion would get that chunked vs a LB.

the point of this post wasnt about her damage. its about how hard her shackles are to escape.
He backed the nanosecond after the root triggered.

It's not that bad. Just need to know how it to works and Dodge it. It's actually the last skill on her I upgrade. Shes a pain in the ass for sure. But every champ has their counter. She has hers too. If your champ is not her counter then you are in trouble. But you can't win them all.
Personally, I think it should apply it's effect as soon as it hits like almost every other skill in the game. It hits, it snares.

It lost its slow. And besides that tether is meant for leblanc to fail the second proc if she is focused
Once it hits its her decision if youre going to take damage or not. not you

It was like this before the rework tho. It just didn't apply her new passive guaranteed before.

But thanks for posting this. This is the perfect example of the issue with the damn thing.
